Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "The back of the card is decorated with a fearsome dragon, painted in red, blue, green, and purple."
"The front of each card is decorated with an image indicating the meaning."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a barefooted man in ragged clothes carrying a stick upon his back."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of an old man standing upon a mountain peak, with a staff in one hand and a lantern containing a six-pointed star in the other."
"The front of this card is decorated with an image of an eight-spoked wheel attended by a person donning an Egyptian headdress."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a woman leaning over a lion, clasping the beast's jaws."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a man hanging from a tree branch upside-down by one ankle."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a skeleton clad in full armor mounted upon a white horse. The skeleton carries a black and white flag in its left hand."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a person pouring liquid from one chalice into another."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of the Devil, with harpy feet, ram horns, bat wings, and a reversed pentagram upon his forehead. In his left hand he holds a torch."
"The front of this card is decorated with an image of two nude figures fleeing from the open door of a burning building."

"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a naked woman kneeling by some water, with one foot in the water and one on land. A large star hangs in the sky above her head, surrounded by seven smaller stars."
"The front of this card is decorated with a night scene featuring a wolf and a dog howling at the moon overhead. Flanking the animals on either side is a pair of large pillars."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a man standing behind a table upon which various game pieces and divination devices are scattered."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of an infant mounted upon a white horse. An anthropomorphized sun occupies much of the background, which is otherwise dotted with sunflowers."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of an angel blowing on a trumpet from which a white flag bearing a red cross hangs. The angel is surrounded by a group of humans."

"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a naked woman hovering above the Earth with a staff in each hand. A wreath surrounds the figure, and images of a human face, a lion, an ox, and an eagle are stationed in the four corners."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a woman clad in pale blue robes with a Papal tiara upon her head."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a woman seated upon a throne. She wears a crown of stars and holds a scepter in her raised right hand."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a bearded man seated upon a throne adorned with rams. He holds an Ankh scepter in his right hand and a globe in his left."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a man clad in a triple crown and red robe seated upon a throne between two pillars."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a couple receiving a blessing from a cleric."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a figure seated in a chariot pulled by two black and white sphinxes."
"The front of this card is decorated with a portrait of a seated man holding a golden scale in his left hand."
